item.description:
Folks, in keeping up with our monthly social team I plan on hosting a game night at my place. Please bring a light snack along with your cards, favorite board games (i'll have monopoly, scene it, scrabble and a few others) and perhaps your wii if you have one. Please note due to the parking situation at my place this event will be limited to 10 people. Please R.S.V.P only if you plan on being there. See you there.

N.B. Directions and address will be sent via email to respondents a day before the event.
item.name: Game Night chez 'Abdul'
